AboutUsPageInfo.Content: This is a sample about us page for the Programmers Blog application. Here you can find information about the blog, its purpose, and the team behind it.
AboutUsPageInfo.SeoDescription: Learn more about the Programmers Blog, its mission, and the team that brings you the latest in programming news and tutorials.
AboutUsPageInfo.SeoTags: Programming, blog, about us, team, mission

WebsiteInfo.Title: Programmers Blog
WebsiteInfo.SeoDescription: A blog for programmers to share knowledge, tutorials, and news about the programming world.
WebsiteInfo.SeoTags: Programming, blog, tutorials, news, software development
